languages.text: "Путь истинно верующих ведет во тьму — на поиски миров, утративших Его сияние и погрязших в грехах. Блаженны дела тех, кто отдается во власть пустоты и варпа в надежде, что деяниями своими приведет свет в темные края Простора и поставит прежде пустой мир на службу Империума". {n}Иеронимус умолкает на несколько секунд.{/n} "И тем горше осознавать, что не все смельчаки исполнят свою миссию. Футфол все еще ждет вестей со "Странника в пустоши" — древнего корабля-ковчега, отправившегося к дальним звездам. Последняя астропатическая весть с него пришла из-за Цинерус Малефикума — с тех пор тайну его судьбы хранят звезды".

"The path of true believers leads into darkness — to search for worlds that have lost His radiance, steeped in depravity. Blessed are the deeds of those who give themselves into the void and the warp in hopes that their actions might bring light into the darker reaches of the Expanse and deliver a previously barren world into the Imperium's service." {n}Hieronymus is silent for a few seconds.{/n} "And all the more bitter is the realisation that not all brave souls will succeed in their mission. Footfall still awaits news from the Wasteland Wayfarer, an ancient ark of a ship headed for distant stars. Her last Astropathic message was sent from beyond the Cinerus Maleficum, and the stars have kept her fate secret since."

Her last astropathic message was sent from beyond the Cinerus Maleficum, and the stars have kept her fate secret since."

languages.text: “真正信徒的道路通向黑暗，通向那些已经失去祂的明光、沉浸在罪恶中的世界。祝福那些将自己奉献给虚空与亚空间的人们，愿他们的牺牲能为科罗努斯扩区的黑暗角落带来光明，希望他们能将荒芜的世界变为服侍帝国的居所。”{n}希罗尼穆斯沉默了几秒钟。{/n}“然而，令人痛苦的是，我们已经意识到，并非所有勇敢的人都能完成使命。落脚港依然在等待来自荒野旅人号的信息。那是一艘驶向遥远星空的古老方舟，她最后的星语信息，来自比苍灰恶咒更加遥远的地方。在那之后，群星就没再揭露过她的命运。”
languages.original_text: "The path of true believers leads into darkness — to search for worlds that have lost His radiance, steeped in depravity. Blessed are the deeds of those who give themselves into the void and the warp in hopes that their actions might bring light into the darker reaches of the Expanse and deliver a previously barren world into the Imperium's service." {n}Hieronymus is silent for a few seconds.{/n} "And all the more bitter is the realisation that not all brave souls will succeed in their mission. Footfall still awaits news from the Wasteland Wayfarer, an ancient ark of a ship headed for distant stars. Her last Astropathic message was sent from beyond the Cinerus Maleficum, and the stars have kept her fate secret since."

languages.text: «El camino de los verdaderos creyentes conduce a la oscuridad, a la búsqueda de mundos que perdieron su resplandor y se diluyeron junto a la depravación. Benditas sean las hazañas de aquellos que sucumben al vacío y a la perversión en aras de que sus acciones puedan llevar la luz a los confines más oscuros de la Extensión y pongan al servicio del Imperium un mundo hasta entonces estéril». {n}Hieronymus guarda silencio durante unos segundos.{/n} «Y aún más amargo es el hecho de que no todas las almas valientes acometen con éxito su misión. Paso aún aguarda noticias del Caminante de los Páramos, el arca antigua de una nave que se dirigía a las estrellas lejanas. Su último mensaje Astropático se envió desde más allá de Cinerus Maleficum. Desde entonces, las estrellas ocultan su sino».
languages.original_text: "The path of true believers leads into darkness — to search for worlds that have lost His radiance, steeped in depravity. Blessed are the deeds of those who give themselves into the void and the warp in hopes that their actions might bring light into the darker reaches of the Expanse and deliver a previously barren world into the Imperium's service." {n}Hieronymus is silent for a few seconds.{/n} "And all the more bitter is the realisation that not all brave souls will succeed in their mission. Footfall still awaits news from the Wasteland Wayfarer, an ancient ark of a ship headed for distant stars. Her last Astropathic message was sent from beyond the Cinerus Maleficum, and the stars have kept her fate secret since."

traits.locale_text: «El camino de los verdaderos creyentes conduce a la oscuridad, a la búsqueda de mundos que perdieron Su resplandor y se diluyeron junto al pecado. Benditas sean las hazañas de aquellos que sucumben al vacío y a la perversión en aras de que sus acciones puedan llevar la luz a los confines más oscuros de la Extensión y pongan al servicio del Imperium un mundo hasta entonces estéril». {n}Hieronymus guarda silencio durante unos segundos.{/n} «Y aún más amargo es el hecho de que no todas las almas valientes acometen con éxito su misión. Paso aún aguarda noticias del Caminante de los Páramos, el arca antigua de una nave que se dirigía a las estrellas lejanas. Su último mensaje astrópata se envió desde más allá de Cinerus Maleficum. Desde entonces, las estrellas ocultan su sino».

languages.text: 「真の信奉者の道は暗闇へと続いています…皇帝の輝きを失い、堕落に染まった世界を探さなければなりません。虚空と歪みに身を投じ、その聖なる行為がエクスパンスの暗黒に光をもたらし、不毛だった世界を帝国の支配下に置くことを望む者たちの行いは皇帝の恵みに値します」{n}ヒエロニムスは数秒間黙った。{/n}「そして、すべての勇敢な魂が任務を成功させるとは限らないという現実が、いっそう私を苦しめるのです。遠い星々へ向かう古代の箱舟、ウェイストランド・ウェイフェアラー号からの知らせを、フットフォールはいまだに待ち続けています。最後の感応通信はサイネラス・マレフィカムの彼方から送られてきました。以降、彼らがどのような運命をたどったのかは不明です」
languages.original_text: "The path of true believers leads into darkness — to search for worlds that have lost His radiance, steeped in depravity. Blessed are the deeds of those who give themselves into the void and the warp in hopes that their actions might bring light into the darker reaches of the Expanse and deliver a previously barren world into the Imperium's service." {n}Hieronymus is silent for a few seconds.{/n} "And all the more bitter is the realisation that not all brave souls will succeed in their mission. Footfall still awaits news from the Wasteland Wayfarer, an ancient ark of a ship headed for distant stars. Her last Astropathic message was sent from beyond the Cinerus Maleficum, and the stars have kept her fate secret since."

traits.locale_text: 「真の信奉者の道は暗闇へと続いています――皇帝の輝きを失い、罪に染まった世界を探さなければなりません。虚空と歪みに身を投じ、その聖なる行為がエクスパンスの暗黒に光をもたらし、不毛だった世界を帝国の支配下に置くことを望む者たちの行いは皇帝の恵みに値します」{n}ヒエロニムスは数秒間黙った。{/n}「そして、すべての勇敢な魂が任務を成功させるとは限らないという現実が、いっそう私を苦しめるのです。遠い星々へ向かう古代の箱舟、ウェイストランド・ウェイフェアラー号からの知らせを、フットフォールはいまだに待ち続けています。最後の感応通信はシネラス・マレフィカムの彼方から送られてきました。以降、彼らがどのような運命をたどったのかは不明です」

languages.text: "Der Pfad der wahren Gläubigen führt in die Dunkelheit – auf der Suche nach Welten, die Seine Strahlkraft verloren haben und in Sittenlosigkeit versunken sind. Gesegnet ist das Wirken derer, die sich der Leere und dem Warp überantworten, in der Hoffnung, Licht in die dunkleren Gebiete der Ausdehnung zu bringen und eine vormals öde Welt in die Dienste des Imperiums zu überführen." {n}Hieronymus schweigt einige Sekunden.{/n} "Umso bitterer ist die Erkenntnis, dass nicht alle tapferen Seelen bei ihrer Mission erfolgreich sein werden. Footfall wartet immer noch auf Nachrichten von der Wasteland Wayfarer, einer alten Arche auf dem Weg zu fernen Sternen. Ihre letzte astropathische Meldung erfolgte von jenseits des Cinerus Maleficum, und seitdem hüllen die Sterne ihr Schicksal in Schweigen."
languages.original_text: "The path of true believers leads into darkness — to search for worlds that have lost His radiance, steeped in depravity. Blessed are the deeds of those who give themselves into the void and the warp in hopes that their actions might bring light into the darker reaches of the Expanse and deliver a previously barren world into the Imperium's service." {n}Hieronymus is silent for a few seconds.{/n} "And all the more bitter is the realisation that not all brave souls will succeed in their mission. Footfall still awaits news from the Wasteland Wayfarer, an ancient ark of a ship headed for distant stars. Her last Astropathic message was sent from beyond the Cinerus Maleficum, and the stars have kept her fate secret since."

traits.locale_text: "Der Pfad der wahren Gläubigen führt in die Dunkelheit – auf der Suche nach Welten, die Seine Strahlkraft verloren haben und in Sünde versunken sind. Gesegnet ist das Wirken derer, die sich der Leere und dem Warp überantworten, in der Hoffnung, Licht in die dunkleren Gebiete der Ausdehnung zu bringen und eine vormals öde Welt in die Dienste des Imperiums zu überführen." {n}Hieronymus schweigt einige Sekunden.{/n} "Umso bitterer ist die Erkenntnis, dass nicht alle tapferen Seelen bei ihrer Mission erfolgreich sein werden. Footfall wartet immer noch auf Nachrichten von der Wasteland Wayfarer, einer alten Arche auf dem Weg zu fernen Sternen. Ihre letzte astropathische Meldung erfolgte von jenseits des Cinerus Maleficum, und seitdem hüllen die Sterne ihr Schicksal in Schweigen."

languages.text: « La voie des vrais croyants les conduit au cœur des ténèbres, à la recherche de mondes isolés de Son rayonnement et étouffés par la dépravation. Bénis soient les actes de ceux qui s'abandonnent au néant et au Warp, dans le simple espoir de faire jaillir la lumière dans les recoins les plus sombres des Étendues de Koronus et d'intégrer au service de l'Imperium un monde jusqu'alors resté aride. » {n}Hiéronymus s'interrompt quelques instants.{/n} « Et quelle cruelle amertume que de comprendre que toutes les âmes courageuses ne mèneront pas leur mission à bien. Castel attend toujours de recevoir des nouvelles du Défricheur, un ancien vaisseau-monde parti en direction d'étoiles lointaines. Son dernier message astropathique nous est parvenu d'au-delà du Cinerus Maleficum. Depuis, le cosmos garde le silence sur son sort. »
languages.original_text: "The path of true believers leads into darkness — to search for worlds that have lost His radiance, steeped in depravity. Blessed are the deeds of those who give themselves into the void and the warp in hopes that their actions might bring light into the darker reaches of the Expanse and deliver a previously barren world into the Imperium's service." {n}Hieronymus is silent for a few seconds.{/n} "And all the more bitter is the realisation that not all brave souls will succeed in their mission. Footfall still awaits news from the Wasteland Wayfarer, an ancient ark of a ship headed for distant stars. Her last Astropathic message was sent from beyond the Cinerus Maleficum, and the stars have kept her fate secret since."

traits.locale_text: « La voie des vrais croyants les conduit au cœur des ténèbres, à la recherche de mondes isolés de Son rayonnement et étouffés par le péché. Bénis soient les actes de ceux qui s'abandonnent au néant et au Warp, dans le simple espoir de faire jaillir la lumière dans les recoins les plus sombres des Étendues de Koronus et d'intégrer au service de l'Imperium un monde jusqu'alors resté aride. » {n}Hiéronymus s'interrompt quelques instants.{/n} « Et quelle cruelle amertume que de comprendre que toutes les âmes courageuses ne mèneront pas leur mission à bien. Castel attend toujours de recevoir des nouvelles du Défricheur, un ancien vaisseau-monde parti en direction d'étoiles lointaines. Son dernier message astropathique bnou est parvenu d'au-delà du Cinerus Maleficum. Depuis, le cosmos garde le silence sur son sort. »

languages.text: "Gerçek iman sahibinin yolu karanlığa çıkar. İmparator'un ışığını yitirmiş, ahlaksızlığa sürüklenmiş dünyaları arar. Eylemleriyle Enginlik'in en karanlık köşelerine ışık getirip kıraç dünyaları İmparatorluk'un hizmetine sokma umuduyla kendisini uçsuza ve öteboyuta atanlar, şüphesiz ki kutsanmıştır." {n}Hieronymus birkaç saniyeliğine sessizleşiyor.{/n} "Bütün cesur ruhların vazifelerinde başarılı olamayacaklarının farkında olmaksa çok acıdır. Binliman, uzak yıldızlara giden kadim ark gemisi Çorak Diyar Yolcusu'ndan hâlâ haber bekliyor. Son Astropatik mesajı, Cinerus Maleficum'un ötesinden gönderilmişti. Yıldızlar o gün bugündür geminin akıbetini bizden gizler."
languages.original_text: "The path of true believers leads into darkness — to search for worlds that have lost His radiance, steeped in depravity. Blessed are the deeds of those who give themselves into the void and the warp in hopes that their actions might bring light into the darker reaches of the Expanse and deliver a previously barren world into the Imperium's service." {n}Hieronymus is silent for a few seconds.{/n} "And all the more bitter is the realisation that not all brave souls will succeed in their mission. Footfall still awaits news from the Wasteland Wayfarer, an ancient ark of a ship headed for distant stars. Her last Astropathic message was sent from beyond the Cinerus Maleficum, and the stars have kept her fate secret since."

traits.locale_text: "Gerçek iman sahibinin yolu karanlığa çıkar. O kişi O'nun ışığını kaybetmiş, ahlaksızlığa sürüklenmiş dünyaların arayışındadır. Eylemleriyle Enginlik'in en karanlık köşelerine ışık getirme ve çorak dünyaları İmparatorluk'un hizmetine sokma umuduyla kendilerini uçsuza ve öteboyuta atanlar şüphesiz ki kutsanmışlardır." {n}Hieronymus birkaç saniyeliğine sessizleşiyor.{/n} "Bütün cesur ruhların görevlerinde başarılı olamayacaklarının farkında olmak ise ne acıdır. Binliman hâlâ uzak yıldızlara giden eski ark gemisi Çorak Diyar Yolcusu'ndan haber bekliyor. Son Astropat mesajı Cinerus Maleficum'un ötesinden gönderilmişti ve yıldızlar akıbetini o gün bugündür gizli tutuyor."
